g.text: Device Link based Certificate Choice Flow
User initiates a login on a website or mobile app.
In non-anonymous flows, the personal code is verified here.
User confirms the device and the account
This device link based certificate choice flow MUST be followed by a linked signature session, as the user is sent to the
callback URL only after signing. The endpoint
must be provided as input in order to link this session to the notification-based signature session.
